BFG.MI.summary: B.F. S.p.A. engages in the cultivation and marketing of agricultural products in Italy. It offers pasta, rice, herbal teas, and legumes/cereals. The company markets its products under the Le Stagioni d'Italia brand. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Jolanda di Savoia, Italy.

KI.MI.summary: Ki Group S.p.A. distributes organic, biodynamic, and natural products in Italy. It offers water, wine, juices, beverages, cereals, flours, grains, dressings, oils and sauces, sweeteners, jams and yeast, dried fruits, sweet and savory snacks, UHT milk, vegetable drinks, desserts, bread and substitutes, pasta, pet food and accessories, breakfast biscuits, bakery products, tea, herbal tea, coffee and alternatives, soups, legumes, and vegetables. The company also produces substitute vegetables, fresh organic meat, and cheese. It offers its products through approximately 4,500 natural food stores, health food stores, and pharmacies. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Turin, Italy. KI Group S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Bioera S.p.A.
